attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are a number of things that the Blair government has condoned, allowed, enabled or instigated that are well out of order; 'little' things like the cynical manipulation of the terrorist threat for political gain, pre-emptive military strikes, the use of media-control and black propaganda and even legislation to stifle dissent, detention without trial, torture and murder... we could go on and on. Our view is that mistakes have to be recognised and someone has to be called to account for our democracy to move forward.

rejection.details:
There are a number of resign petitions already up, including this one:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Resign/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
